name: Crazy Ball (itch) (Entevily)
description:
Defeat your friend in this epic game of Pong with a twist. The ball is a bit crazy and the paddle is kind of special.

CONTROLS:

W & S to move left paddle.

UP & DOWN ARROWS to move right paddle.

Basically I'm doing a mini game jam every week for one year. 

This game is made for two local players on the same PC to play. There is no multiplayer and there is no single player. Two player local play.
